verses.verse: When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5394>it<s%>, and has cast out <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2850>you<s%>, the Hittites, and the <S%H1622>Girgashites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>you<s%>;

And when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5221>you<s%>; you shall strike <S%H2763>them<s%>, and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H3772>them<s%>; you shall make no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H2603>them<s%>, nor show mercy unto them:

Neither shall you make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with <S%H1323>them<s%>; your daughter you shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>, nor his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> unto your <S%H1121>son<s%>.

For they will turn <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H5647>me<s%>, that they may serve <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: so will the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8045>you<s%>, and destroy you <S%H4118>suddenly<s%>.

But thus shall you <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H5422>them<s%>; you shall destroy their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and break <S%H7665>down<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>, and cut <S%H1438>down<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

For you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5459>special<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H5971>himself<s%>, above all people that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did not set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon <S%H977>you<s%>, nor choose <S%H7230>you<s%>, because you were more in number than any <S%H5971>people<s%>; for you were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of all <S%H5971>people<s%>:

But because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> <S%H8104>you<s%>, and because he would keep the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which he had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, which <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>;

And <S%H7999>repays<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him to their <S%H6440>face<s%>, to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H309>them<s%>: he will not be slack to him that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H7999>him<s%>, he will repay him to his <S%H6440>face<s%>.

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to do <S%H6213>them<s%>.

Why it shall come to <S%H6118>pass<s%>, if you <S%H8085>listen<s%> to these <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, that the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> unto you the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>:

And he will <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H1288>you<s%>, and bless <S%H7235>you<s%>, and multiply <S%H1288>you<s%>: he will also bless the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>womb<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%>, your <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and your <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and your <S%H3323>oil<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows<s%>, and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>you<s%>.
You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above all <S%H5971>people<s%>: there shall not be <S%H6135>male<s%> or female <S%H6135>childless<s%> among <S%H929>you<s%>, or among your cattle.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> from you all <S%H2483>sickness<s%>, and will <S%H7760>put<s%> none of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which you <S%H3045>know<s%>, upon <S%H5414>you<s%>; but will lay them upon all them that hate <S%H8130>you<s%>.

And you shall <S%H398>consume<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H5869>you<s%>; your eye shall have no <S%H2347>pity<s%> upon <S%H5647>them<s%>: neither shall you serve their <S%H430>gods<s%>; for that will be a snare unto <S%H4170>you<s%>.
If you shall <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, These <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> than <S%H349>I<s%>; how <S%H3201>can<s%> I dispossess <S%H3423>them<s%>?

You shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H2142>them<s%>: but shall well <S%H2142>remember<s%> what the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and unto all <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and the <S%H226>signs<s%>, and the <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and the stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, by which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%>: so shall the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of whom you are <S%H3373>afraid<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> among <S%H7604>them<s%>, until they that are left, and <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H6>you<s%>, be destroyed.
You shall not be <S%H6206>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>: for the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H1419>you<s%>, a mighty <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will put <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%>: you <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H3615>consume<s%> them at <S%H4118>once<s%>, lest the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> increase upon <S%H7235>you<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them unto <S%H6440>you<s%>, and shall <S%H1949>destroy<s%> them with a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H4103>destruction<s%>, until they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and you shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: there shall no <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8045>you<s%>, until you have destroyed them.

The engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall you <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: you shall not <S%H2530>desire<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is on <S%H3947>them<s%>, nor take it unto <S%H3369>you<s%>, lest you be snared in <S%H8441>it<s%>: for it is an abomination to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Neither shall you <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> into your <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest you be a cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> like <S%H8262>it<s%>: but you shall utterly <S%H8262>detest<s%> <S%H8581>it<s%>, and you shall utterly <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H2764>it<s%>; for it is a cursed thing.
